BASIC_INFORMATION.TITLE: Basic information
BASIC_INFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Please fill in the form below to register. Fields marked with * are required.

BILLING_INFORMATION.TITLE: Billing information
BILLING_INFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Please fill in the form below to register. Fields marked with * are required.

REGISTER_COMPLETED.TITLE: You have successfully registered!
REGISTER_COMPLETED.DESCRIPTION: You will receive an email with a confirmation link. Please click on the link to activate your account.

EMAIL_VERIFICATION.TITLE: Email verification
EMAIL_VERIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: You are just one step away from verifying your email. Complete the captcha and click the Verify email button.

COMPLETED.TITLE: Email verified!
COMPLETED.DESCRIPTION: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now log in to your account.

REQUEST_CODE.TITLE: Email sent
REQUEST_CODE.DESCRIPTION: We have sent you an email with a new verification code. Please check your inbox and spam folder.
